title: Rotary International
summary: Rotary International is an international service organization whose stated purpose is to bring together business and professional leaders in order to provide humanitarian service and to advance goodwill and peace around the world.[1] It is a non-political and non-religious organization. Membership is by invite and based on various social factors. There are over 35,000[2] member clubs worldwide, with a membership of 1.2 million individuals, known as Rotarians.[1]
